attributes.title: itâ€™s a no from me

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is terrible just terrible! It takes 20 GB to download it takes up to much storage. Aside from that, the app itself is very slow in processing. I am awfully disgusted. As soon as you open the app it asks for your address so they can be able to send officers to your house. THIS IS NOT OK! I canâ€™t believe the horribleness of this app! Other from the asking of the address the app also starts playing horrible music which cause my little sister to be deaf on both ears. I cannot explain what this app has done to my family but it has forced us to change for the worst. This app was also threatening my family that if we didnâ€™t change for the worst they would send officers to kill us. A human being should NOT have to deal with being scared just because of an app. I would like to write more on how terrible this app is but there is not enough space, overall donâ€™t download this app AND APPLE PLEASE TAKE THIS OFF THE APPLE PLAY STORE!

attributes.title: Iâ€™m honestly disgusted
attributes.review: Iâ€™m normally not one to write reviews... I donâ€™t wan to be seen as a karen. But with the app I have to. First off it took forever to download in WiFi (I think 2 hours to be exact). Thatâ€™s just too long for me to wait to get my news. By then those snowflakes will have taken over the world!! Anyways once it was downloaded it glitches out and closed the app Everytime I opened it. I figured that the issue would resolve itself so I let it just sit there while I occupied myself with other tasks such as preaching ALL LIVES MATTER to my grandchildren (that generation z is gonna be the death of us smart folk let me tell yâ€™all) when I went back on my phone I noticed MY BATTERY WAS DRAINED!!! HOW could a single app thatâ€™s not even being used drain my battery like that?!? 0/10 recommend- to all my fellow conservatives I urge you to not download this app, honestly I think it might have hacked my whole device. I am scared for my life.

attributes.title: Useless
attributes.review: This app it useless there is no point in having this app when all the president does is make more problems. The app is telling us about â€œgood thingsâ€ Donald Trump is doing for our country and  this app just shows us the unnecessary things that are being done for our country. Like building a wall what was the point, to keep people living in Spanish speaking countries from being free? Honestly, this app does nothing for me, except show me all the time what bad things are happening to our country. Many people say their is no reason not to be a Trump supporter, But to me and probably many other people in the United States their are multiple reasons why we arenâ€™t supporters. So this app is unnecessary, that i know of Trump is the only president with an app. But, what happens if he doesn't get re elected in 2020 this app will be a waste. So no matter what anybody says to me i will forever believe this app is useless and unnecessary. Thank you for reading.

attributes.title: This man tore apart my family ğŸ˜«
attributes.review: My life since trump began his reign *cough cough* sorry presidency, has sucked. Trump has killed my will to live many a time and I commend him on this effort solely seeing as how he did it so well. My mother has disowned me for accidentally following him on twitter. My father has drop kicked my phone into a lake for talking about how heâ€™s made me hate life. Now onto how this app contributed. Yesterday morning I stumbled across this app. I wanted to see trumps anger level rise seeing as how I would be the gap that turned his 9 downloads into 10. My brother screamed like he saw a ghost. He stomped into my room and started yelling at me in slomo. â€œYoU oRaNgE lOvInG tRaItOr!!!â€ My bones were clacking in fear. He ran across my room and palm punched me in the throat. As I struggled for air my little sister came in and proceeded to shoot me repeatedly with nerf bullets. Then my cat ran in and clawed my toes to shreds. I am now writing this review from my bunker in Iowa. DO NOT BUY THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR FAMILY!!!

attributes.title: DONT USE

i got this app and it took weeks to download. but once i got on the app it was making weird sounds then it hacked into my account and purchased 4.20 gallons of fake tanner and 69 giant slugs and i am deathly afraid of slugs. the slugs were sent to my house they killed my dog and then tried to eat my baby cousin!! they then ran around my house with my dead dog .i had to use the 4.20 gallons of fake tanner to
